content.p:
ยง 668. Schenectady urban renewal agency. An urban renewal agency, to
be known as the Schenectady urban renewal agency, is hereby established
for the accomplishment of any or all of the purposes specified in
articles fifteen and fifteen-A of this chapter and in accordance with
article eighteen of the constitution of the state of New York. It shall
constitute a body corporate and politic and be perpetual in duration and
consist of the members of the city council and mayor who shall be
chairman. The mayor shall be its administrative head and executive
secretary. It shall have the powers and duties now or hereafter
conferred by article fifteen-A of this chapter upon municipal urban
renewal agencies. It shall be organized in the manner prescribed by and
be subject to the provisions of article fifteen-A of the general
municipal law and the agency, its members, officers and employees and
its operations and activities shall in all respects be governed by the
provisions of such article.
